sentences.sentence: If good people do nothing there is a real possibility that an uninformed citizenry will extinguish the precious embers of medical progress.
sentences.translation: 如果好人什么都不做，一群无知的公民就有可能扑灭医学进步的宝贵火种。

sentences.sentence: He used the medium of radio when he wanted to enlist public support or reassure the citizenry.
sentences.translation: 当他想得到公众支持或恢复民信时，他使用广播作载体。

sentences.sentence: Attention should now move to the citizenry.
sentences.translation: 接下来应该将注意力转移到公民身上了。
